original_text:
Therefore Sheol has enlarged its appetite
    and opened its mouth beyond measure,
and the nobility of Jerusalem and her multitude will go down,
    her revelers and he who exults in her.
korean_text: 그러므로 스올이 욕심을 크게 내어 한량 없이 그 입을 벌린즉 그들의 호화로움과 그들의 많은 무리와 그들의 떠드는 것과 그 중에서 즐거워하는 자가 거기에 빠질 것이라

sentences.original_text: Therefore Sheol has enlarged its appetite
and opened its mouth beyond measure
and her multitude will go down
and he who exults in her
